thread.title: YES Bank to set up delivery centre in Chennai that can create 12,000 jobs
thread.title_full: YES Bank to set up delivery centre in Chennai that can create 12,000 jobs

title: YES Bank to set up delivery centre in Chennai that can create 12,000 jobs
text: YES Bank to set up delivery centre in Chennai that can create 12,000 jobs By Bharani Vaitheesvaran & Shilpa Elizabeth , ET Bureau | 9 Sep, 2015, 12.21PM IST   YES Bank will open in Chennai its largest-ever operations management and financial services delivery in centre with an employment opportunity of creating 12,000 jobs in the financial and technology space, the company's MD and CEO said at the inaugural function of the Tamil Nadu Global Investors Meet here today. The facility will be a tower leased at a business park owned by IndiaBulls in Ambattur, Chennai. With an initial plan to take up 4 lakh sq. ft of space, the company will later scale it up to 9 lakh sq. ft. The phase one of the facility is expected to be ready by the first quarter of fiscal year 2016-17. Yes Bank hosts its operations management and techology services staff at its offices in Mumbai and Delhi. With this announcement, YES Bank will create additional jobs in Chennai. Besides work stations, the office will have fitness centres, indoor sports areas, and a cafeteria named Yes Cafe. The Tamil Nadu Global Investors Meet, which was originally planned for October 2014 and postponed-thrice, and has taken off now. It is expected to rope in over Rs 1 lakh crore of investments into Tamil Nadu.
